meanings.definition: To restore mythical elements to a story or belief system.
meanings.sent1: She is remythologizing the ancient tale to make it more magical.
meanings.sent2: The author is remythologizing old stories to captivate a new audience.
meanings.sent3: By remythologizing the legend, she added a touch of wonder to the narrative.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling skills are so powerful that he can remythologize reality itself.
meanings.sent5: The process of remythologizing brings new life to ancient myths.

meanings.definition: The act of reinterpreting a myth or legend in a contemporary context.
meanings.sent1: The remythologizing of folklore helps keep traditions alive.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the remythologizing of myths to understand cultural changes.
meanings.sent3: The museum exhibit showcased the remythologizing of classic tales in modern art.
meanings.sent4: In literature, remythologizing can create a bridge between past and present.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for remythologizing stories shines through in her artwork.
